name: 3 Minutes or DIE
description:
Genre: Double Hack-Slash RPG

Playing Time: 3 minutes at one round.

WOLF RPG Editor (Japanese Game Editor)

Though you can't goal firstly, but, you will be able to do at last.

And, you will get the score at last. Catch your best score!

= = = = =

*The original is here: https://www.freem.ne.jp/win/game/24486 (Jp. Ver.)
*Game Streaming is allowed.
